page.description: The Validation rules property defines how your grid component will respond when a user inputs data into an editable field. As with the Field Properties list, these rules change depending on what type of control you are working with.

section.title: Invalid data type error message
section.description: The 'Invalid data type error message'Â rule works with all fields except character fields. This rule allows you to define a message that will display if the user types in an invalid date, time, short time, or number into an input field.
